description: This file demonstrates a multi-user, multi-session chat system using an agent, memory, and storage components. It sets up users, sessions, and runs a chat simulation with memory retrieval.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of responding to user inputs, managing conversations, and utilizing memory and storage.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Handles user memories, allowing for storing and retrieving conversation history.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Provides storage interface backed by SQLite database.

classes.name: SqliteMemoryDb
classes.description: SQLite-based database for storing memory data.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: Model class representing the Claude language model.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: Model class representing the Gemini language model.

methods.name: run_chat_agent
methods.description: Asynchronous function that runs a simulated multi-user chat session, demonstrating memory usage and responses.
